item.title: My first blog post
item.description: Sys.setenv(RETICULATE_PYTHON = "/Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/bin/python") reticulate::py_config() ## python: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/bin/python ## libpython: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/lib/libpython3.8.dylib ## pythonhome: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use:/Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use ## version: 3.8.12 | packaged by conda-forge | (default, Oct 12 2021, 21:21:17) [Clang 11.1.0 ] ## numpy: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numpy ## numpy_version: 1.21.4 ## ## NOTE: Python version was forced by RETICULATE_PYTHON import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # x axis values x = [1,2,3] # corresponding y axis values y = [2,4,1] # plotting the points plt.plot(x, y) # naming the x axis plt.
